name: Yingcai Wu
content: Yingcai Wu | Home HOME ABOUT ME TEAM WEBSITE PUBLICATION TALKS SERVICE Yingcai Wu Head , IDG@ZJU (Interactive Data Group at Zhejiang University) Professor , State Key Lab of CAD & CG , College of Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University , Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China Email: ycwu [at] zju.edu.cn Research Interests: Visual Analytics: Urban Informatics, Sports Analytics, and Social Media Information Visualization and HCI News & Events I am looking for strongly-motivated PostDoc, PhD, Master, and undergraduate students to join my research team. If you are interested in visualization research, please contact me. I have been invited to be an area paper chair of IEEE VIS 2023. Recent Projects SmartAdp: A visual location selection method. [paper] [system][project] [video] RouteZoomer: A novel route-zooming method. [paper][video] [project] PieceStack: Toward Better Understanding of Stacked Graphs. [paper] [project] [video] PeakVizor: Visualize Peaks in Video Clickstreams [paper] [project] [video] EvoRiver: explore topic coopetition on social media. [paper] [project] [video] OpinionFlow: visualize opinion diffusion on social media.
